item.title: Deviled Eggs
item.description: Ingredients 6 Eggs 1/4 Cup Mayonnaise 1/4 onion, finely chopped 1 teaspoon white vinegar 1 teaspoon yellow mustard 1/8 teaspoon salt 1 dash hot pepper sauce Black pepper Paprika, for garnish Directions Place eggs in a medium saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat. Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes. Remove from hot water, cool and peel.
